title: HESE Metric History Buffer Configuration
description: Configuration parameters defining the rolling window and decay behavior for Delta prediction error calculation within HESE, providing the input metrics for Calibration Factors.

window_size_seconds.description: Duration (in seconds) of the rolling window used for calculation of delta statistics (average and variance).

decay_alpha.description: Exponential decay factor (alpha) applied to older samples within the window (0.0=simple average, 1.0=only newest data).

sampling_frequency_hz.description: Expected frequency (Hertz) at which prediction errors are ingested into the buffer.

latency_threshold_ms.description: Maximum acceptable processing latency for a delta sample before it is discarded or weighted down significantly.
